intro: Artemisia palmata, commonly known as silverleaf sage, is a perennial herb native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage, which is covered in fine,茸-like hairs. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in late summer.
